title: Cognitive Load Measurement and Optimization Strategies in Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: Learning to scientifically measure and analyze cognitive load during social sector project execution in BYOD-based virtual learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain three types of extraneous cognitive load (instructional, interactional, environmental) in virtual learning environments
Learners can assess peer learners' cognitive load and provide feedback using the MCLSVE scale
Learners can propose at least two optimization strategies incorporating cognitive load measurement results when designing Project-Based Learning (PBL)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
